org.springframework.cloud.dataflow.yarn.h2

Class H2ConfigurationProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cloud.dataflow.yarn.h2.H2ConfigurationProperties

  • @ConfigurationProperties(prefix="dataflow.database.h2")
public class H2ConfigurationProperties
extends Object
    Configuration properties for H2 database server. Database port defaults to '19092'. Default username is 'sa' with no password. Default database name is 'dataflow'. On default in-memory database is defined which will be persisted if 'directory' is defined.
    Author:
    Janne Valkealahti
